short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access the infinite potential of articificial intelligence.  Visit https://www.infinitai.co for more information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No registration! 

Instantly start using AI to answer your questions, create content, or even custom images - without leaving the page you're on!

Why would you pay for ChatGPT when you can use the same exact AI model for free with Infinitai?

Answer your strangest questions, draft formal emails, generate dinner recommendations - Infinitai can help with anything.  


Recent updates:

Dark mode!

Open a new fullscreen chat in a new window at the click of a button

We have officially added GPT-4o as our default chat model!

DALLE 3 for simple photo realistic image generation at no cost!  

Experiment with the power of DALLE 3 with no registration or subscription requirement - just add this extension to your browser, describe what you would like to see and create something the world has never seen in seconds.


More on the way: 
the introduction of a stand alone webapp for when a chrome extension just doesn't cut it, 
multi-modal (image) support and interpretation for our GPT-4o model,
custom file upload and analysis,
+ even more AI models:
ChatGPT plugins, Google Gemini Advanced, and Claude 3 Opus (Anthropic)!
